tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Believe me and I am not writing this as I have any aqintance with this doctor, ***** ******* **** ****** ** ****  ** ***** *** *** *** I thank the almighty to have brought me to Jeewan Mala Hospital.  For all Gayne problems ladies u must be here.  Dr Malvika and Dr Shivani are such decent human beings,  if you really want to be in safe hands and be satisfied with your treatment u must be here. Let me say this Doctor Shivani is blessed with a noble soul and genuine approach,  she will do everything what is good for u . I was operated here n 13th May 2019and I thank the almighty to have brought me here the staff to is excellent trust me . I am writing this riview  from my heart. God bless this family. Kamaljeet.kaur

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
********** ** *** **** ***** * **** **** *** ** ** *****.i had 3 surgeries done by Dr.shivani only..she is an amazing person with a wonderful soul..she will make u understand the things regarding ur health issues till u dont get satisfaction with so much of patience and ease..Even my elder daughter admires her alot and says that i and my lil sis will also become like Dr.shivani..
Thankyou so much Dr.shivani for ur always kind support for ur patients..stay blessed..

tags: None
review: Doc Shivani , where do I begin :) very professional yet friendly , she is a great person with a practical approach for her patients . Perfect in the her field . Amazing experience with her as she handles everything with such ease & confidence, absolute delight to know her as a doc . Highly recommend her . Good luck!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i had the problem of boil which happened to be in the vaginal area, so was extremely worried -1. consultation charge in Practo showed 750, actual charge was 10002. wait time was 2.5 hrs despite having an appointment3. when the doctor finally made it she barely spent 5 minutes before she left halfway without finishing what she was saying, and just left, delegated everything to the nurses ** *** ******** ****** ** **** **** *** ******** ********* they quoted Rs. 16000 *** **** ****** *** *** **** **** *** ******* *** ******** **** **** **** ******* *** **** ****** ******* ******* *** ** ******* ******* ** ******* ** ************* *** ******** ****** ********* ** ********* ***** ************* ***** *** ** ***** ***** ****** **** * ******

tags: None
review: We had a great experience with Dr. Shivani at Jeewan mala hospital,  have been visiting her since my day 1 and every meeting has been great. She takes complete interest in patients journey and explains each and every step and process in detail. She's quite approachable and keeps providing gudiance.. makes you feel at ease.. She will make your pregnancy a beautiful experience..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** ******* ** *** **** ****** *** *** *** ***** * **** **** **** Both my pregnancies were handled by her. She is extremely sweet and friendly with her patients. My second pregnancy was quite complicated and she made sure I m very well taken care off and I had a smooth delivery. *** ** ***** *** **** *** would highly recommend her to everyone. 
Thank you Dr. Shivani .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Well I have always been cynical about visiting a gynacelogist because of my past bad experiences.But she completely changed my perception.She was really friendly and gentle with an assuring and soothing smile.Though I had to wait a bit longer,but it was worth the wait.She did not prescribe any unnecessary tests or anything.I was freaking out before but came out of her cabin smiling and relieved.Overall I am very satisfied with my experience .Visit her and you won't be disappointed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Experience with doctor is good. But hospital staff is not working well. I went to hospital for check up. They used my credit card and debited payment two times.Rs500 X 2.   I asked lady at reception " meenakshi " to reverse the payment. She said it will take 24 hours. It's over 12 days and still not got my money back. The lady at reception " Meenakshi"never picks up call and responds. I checked with my bank, they said hospital is not reversing payment and they gave me transaction id. I don't advise anybody visit their hospital if they have such lazy staff. I will not visit again to this hospital. Anuj Srivastav

tags: None
review: She was good . Listened my problems but didn't explain me my problems elaborately just gave lots of medicine .

tags: None
review: I consulted her in the last month and the results were extremely satisfying. She diligently conducted the session and provided a suitable treatment. The issues got resolved in a short span of time. So I delayed with my follow up. But I will be visiting her shortly. There was no other issues with the waiting time or management. It was a completely satisfying experience.

review: after waiting for two hours ,she barely took a look for two minutes and spoke for another two before she left in the middle. she delegated the prescription to who looked like nurse, and left for good. very unsatisfactory and insensitive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** * **** **** *** She is very friendly  nature. So i will recommend dr. Shivani sabbarwal. Good

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Awesome Doctor and very proactive plus positive.  We are very happy and feel proud to have Dr Shivani....my personal experience is good and satisfactory.  Her entries team is also very helpful and cooperative.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
** ******* ***** *** ******* ****** * **** **** *** * Thank you so much from the bottom of my heart for taking such good care of me during the pregnancy as well as the delivery!! Because of your professionalism and great smiles, we felt like we were in good hands and that gave us peace of mind towards the big day. You always prefer to go for normal delivery which is the best part. 

Thanks 
Lots of love 
Nausheen & Naura

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
When a person goes to a doctor he or she expect to be treated like a human being first which actually ends half the problem of the patient at same time. Dr. Malvika sabharwal and her team does the same. They are so humble, listen to the problem and suggest accordingly in a very positive manner.
Thank you team.
Keep it up.....

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
context: Ovarian Cyst Removal,Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),
review: Dr.shivani &Dr. Malvika sabharwal are the best docs for all the health issues of females.. I had my 3 surgeries performed by dr.shivani only with so much ease, support,care,understanding, & with  making my all doubts clear & i must say dr.shivani is very polite and confident and perfect in her field..even the hospital staff is quite supportive..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
Doctor friendliness,
review: One of the most understanding doctor I have met. She is very Friendly, patient and understanding. I have had a fabulous experience with her.

tags: None
review: Very friendly and genuine. Guided me very thoroughly and gives appropriate time for all relevant concerns.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Amazing experience ! Both Dr. Shivani and Dr. Malvika are the loveliest doctors I have met so far. They make the patient feel super comfortable and create a safe space. Will definitely 100 percent reccomend.
